media:group.media:title: 10 Essential Slowcore Albums
media:group.media:description:
► In today's video, I discuss 10 essential Slowcore albums that have been largely influential within the subgenre. Ranging from the melancholic lows of Codeine to the spacey soundscapes of Duster, Slowcore is a fascinating subgenre of indie rock that is severely underappreciated. So, without further ado, here are my picks for some of the most important Slowcore albums of all time.
